48 GST_DEBUG_CATEGORY_STATIC (aspect_ratio_crop_debug);
49 #define GST_CAT_DEFAULT aspect_ratio_crop_debug

51 enum
52 {
53  PROP_0,
54  PROP_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP,
55 };
56 
57 /* we support the same caps as videocrop (sync changes) */
58 #define ASPECT_RATIO_CROP_CAPS \
59  GST_VIDEO_CAPS_MAKE ("{ RGBx, xRGB, BGRx, xBGR, " \
60  "RGBA, ARGB, BGRA, ABGR, RGB, BGR, AYUV, YUY2, " \
61  "YVYU, UYVY, I420, YV12, RGB16, RGB15, GRAY8, " \
62  "NV12, NV21, GRAY16_LE, GRAY16_BE }")
63 
64 static GstStaticPadTemplate src_template = GST_STATIC_PAD_TEMPLATE ("src",
65  GST_PAD_SRC,
66  GST_PAD_ALWAYS,
67  GST_STATIC_CAPS (ASPECT_RATIO_CROP_CAPS)
68  );
69 
70 static GstStaticPadTemplate sink_template = GST_STATIC_PAD_TEMPLATE ("sink",
71  GST_PAD_SINK,
72  GST_PAD_ALWAYS,
73  GST_STATIC_CAPS (ASPECT_RATIO_CROP_CAPS)
74  );
75 
76 #define gst_aspect_ratio_crop_parent_class parent_class
77 G_DEFINE_TYPE (GstAspectRatioCrop, gst_aspect_ratio_crop, GST_TYPE_BIN);

80  const GValue * value, GParamSpec * pspec);

84  aspect_ratio_crop, gint top, gint right, gint bottom, gint left);

97 static void
98 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_cropping (GstAspectRatioCrop * aspect_ratio_crop,
99  gint top, gint right, gint bottom, gint left)
100 {
101  GValue value = { 0 };
102  if (G_UNLIKELY (!aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop)) {
103  GST_WARNING_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop,
104  "Can't set the settings if there is no cropping element");
105  return;
106  }
107 
108  g_value_init (&value, G_TYPE_INT);
109  g_value_set_int (&value, top);
110  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop, "set top cropping to: %d", top);
111  g_object_set_property (G_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop), "top",
112  &value);
113  g_value_set_int (&value, right);
114  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop, "set right cropping to: %d", right);
115  g_object_set_property (G_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop), "right",
116  &value);
117  g_value_set_int (&value, bottom);
118  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop, "set bottom cropping to: %d", bottom);
119  g_object_set_property (G_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop), "bottom",
120  &value);
121  g_value_set_int (&value, left);
122  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop, "set left cropping to: %d", left);
123  g_object_set_property (G_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop), "left",
124  &value);
125 
126  g_value_unset (&value);
127 }
128 
129 static gboolean
130 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_caps (GstAspectRatioCrop * aspect_ratio_crop,
131  GstCaps * caps)
132 {
133  GstPad *peer_pad;
134  GstStructure *structure;
135  gboolean ret;
136 
137  g_mutex_lock (&aspect_ratio_crop->crop_lock);
138 
139  structure = gst_caps_get_structure (caps, 0);
140  gst_aspect_ratio_transform_structure (aspect_ratio_crop, structure, NULL,
141  TRUE);
142  peer_pad =
143  gst_element_get_static_pad (GST_ELEMENT (aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop),
144  "sink");
145  ret = gst_pad_set_caps (peer_pad, caps);
146  gst_object_unref (peer_pad);
147  g_mutex_unlock (&aspect_ratio_crop->crop_lock);
148  return ret;
149 }
150 
151 static gboolean
152 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_sink_event (GstPad * pad, GstObject * parent,
153  GstEvent * evt)
154 {
155  GstAspectRatioCrop *aspect_ratio_crop = GST_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP (parent);
156 
157  switch (GST_EVENT_TYPE (evt)) {
158  case GST_EVENT_CAPS:
159  {
160  GstCaps *caps;
161 
162  gst_event_parse_caps (evt, &caps);
163  gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_caps (aspect_ratio_crop, caps);
164  break;
165  }
166  default:
167  break;
168  }
169 
170  return gst_pad_event_default (pad, parent, evt);
171 }
172 
173 static void
174 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_class_init (GstAspectRatioCropClass * klass)
175 {
176  GObjectClass *gobject_class;
177  GstElementClass *element_class;
178 
179  gobject_class = (GObjectClass *) klass;
180  element_class = (GstElementClass *) klass;
181 
182  gobject_class->set_property = gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_property;
183  gobject_class->get_property = gst_aspect_ratio_crop_get_property;
184  gobject_class->finalize = gst_aspect_ratio_crop_finalize;
185 
186  g_object_class_install_property (gobject_class, PROP_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP,
187  gst_param_spec_fraction ("aspect-ratio", "aspect-ratio",
188  "Target aspect-ratio of video", 0, 1, G_MAXINT, 1, 0, 1,
189  G_PARAM_READWRITE | G_PARAM_STATIC_STRINGS));
190 
191  gst_element_class_set_static_metadata (element_class, "aspectratiocrop",
192  "Filter/Effect/Video",
193  "Crops video into a user-defined aspect-ratio",
194  "Thijs Vermeir <thijsvermeir@gmail.com>");
195 
196  gst_element_class_add_static_pad_template (element_class, &sink_template);
197  gst_element_class_add_static_pad_template (element_class, &src_template);
198 }
199 
200 static void
201 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_finalize (GObject * object)
202 {
203  GstAspectRatioCrop *aspect_ratio_crop;
204 
205  aspect_ratio_crop = GST_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP (object);
206 
207  g_mutex_clear (&aspect_ratio_crop->crop_lock);
208 
209  G_OBJECT_CLASS (parent_class)->finalize (object);
210 }
211 
212 static void
213 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_init (GstAspectRatioCrop * aspect_ratio_crop)
214 {
215  GstPad *link_pad;
216  GstPad *src_pad;
217 
218  GST_DEBUG_CATEGORY_INIT (aspect_ratio_crop_debug, "aspectratiocrop", 0,
219  "aspectratiocrop");
220 
221  aspect_ratio_crop->ar_num = 0;
222  aspect_ratio_crop->ar_denom = 1;
223 
224  g_mutex_init (&aspect_ratio_crop->crop_lock);
225 
226  /* add the transform element */
227  aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop = gst_element_factory_make ("videocrop", NULL);
228  gst_bin_add (GST_BIN (aspect_ratio_crop), aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop);
229 
230  /* create ghost pad src */
231  link_pad =
232  gst_element_get_static_pad (GST_ELEMENT (aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop),
233  "src");
234  src_pad = gst_ghost_pad_new ("src", link_pad);
235  gst_pad_set_query_function (src_pad,
236  GST_DEBUG_FUNCPTR (gst_aspect_ratio_crop_src_query));
237  gst_element_add_pad (GST_ELEMENT (aspect_ratio_crop), src_pad);
238  gst_object_unref (link_pad);
239  /* create ghost pad sink */
240  link_pad =
241  gst_element_get_static_pad (GST_ELEMENT (aspect_ratio_crop->videocrop),
242  "sink");
243  aspect_ratio_crop->sink = gst_ghost_pad_new ("sink", link_pad);
244  gst_element_add_pad (GST_ELEMENT (aspect_ratio_crop),
245  aspect_ratio_crop->sink);
246  gst_object_unref (link_pad);
247 
248  gst_pad_set_event_function (aspect_ratio_crop->sink,
249  GST_DEBUG_FUNCPTR (gst_aspect_ratio_crop_sink_event));
250 }
251 
252 static void
253 gst_aspect_ratio_transform_structure (GstAspectRatioCrop * aspect_ratio_crop,
254  GstStructure * structure, GstStructure ** new_structure,
255  gboolean set_videocrop)
256 {
257  gdouble incoming_ar;
258  gdouble requested_ar;
259  gint width, height;
260  gint cropvalue;
261  gint par_d, par_n;
262 
263  /* Check if we need to change the aspect ratio */
264  if (aspect_ratio_crop->ar_num < 1) {
265  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop, "No cropping requested");
266  goto beach;
267  }
268 
269  /* get the information from the caps */
270  if (!gst_structure_get_int (structure, "width", &width) ||
271  !gst_structure_get_int (structure, "height", &height))
272  goto beach;
273 
274  if (!gst_structure_get_fraction (structure, "pixel-aspect-ratio",
275  &par_n, &par_d)) {
276  par_d = par_n = 1;
277  }
278 
279  incoming_ar = ((gdouble) (width * par_n)) / (height * par_d);
280  GST_LOG_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop,
281  "incoming caps width(%d), height(%d), par (%d/%d) : ar = %f", width,
282  height, par_n, par_d, incoming_ar);
283 
284  requested_ar =
285  (gdouble) aspect_ratio_crop->ar_num / aspect_ratio_crop->ar_denom;
286 
287  /* check if the original aspect-ratio is the aspect-ratio that we want */
288  if (requested_ar == incoming_ar) {
289  GST_DEBUG_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop,
290  "Input video already has the correct aspect ratio (%.3f == %.3f)",
291  incoming_ar, requested_ar);
292  goto beach;
293  } else if (requested_ar > incoming_ar) {
294  /* fix aspect ratio with cropping on top and bottom */
295  cropvalue =
296  ((((double) aspect_ratio_crop->ar_denom /
297  (double) (aspect_ratio_crop->ar_num)) * ((double) par_n /
298  (double) par_d) * width) - height) / 2;
299  if (cropvalue < 0) {
300  cropvalue *= -1;
301  }
302  if (cropvalue >= (height / 2))
303  goto crop_failed;
304  if (set_videocrop) {
305  gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_cropping (aspect_ratio_crop, cropvalue, 0,
306  cropvalue, 0);
307  }
308  if (new_structure) {
309  *new_structure = gst_structure_copy (structure);
310  gst_structure_set (*new_structure,
311  "height", G_TYPE_INT, (int) (height - (cropvalue * 2)), NULL);
312  }
313  } else {
314  /* fix aspect ratio with cropping on left and right */
315  cropvalue =
316  ((((double) aspect_ratio_crop->ar_num /
317  (double) (aspect_ratio_crop->ar_denom)) * ((double) par_d /
318  (double) par_n) * height) - width) / 2;
319  if (cropvalue < 0) {
320  cropvalue *= -1;
321  }
322  if (cropvalue >= (width / 2))
323  goto crop_failed;
324  if (set_videocrop) {
325  gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_cropping (aspect_ratio_crop, 0, cropvalue,
326  0, cropvalue);
327  }
328  if (new_structure) {
329  *new_structure = gst_structure_copy (structure);
330  gst_structure_set (*new_structure,
331  "width", G_TYPE_INT, (int) (width - (cropvalue * 2)), NULL);
332  }
333  }
334 
335  return;
336 
337 crop_failed:
338  GST_WARNING_OBJECT (aspect_ratio_crop,
339  "can't crop to aspect ratio requested");
340  goto beach;
341 beach:
342  if (set_videocrop) {
343  gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_cropping (aspect_ratio_crop, 0, 0, 0, 0);
344  }
345 
346  if (new_structure) {
347  *new_structure = gst_structure_copy (structure);
348  }
349 }
350 
351 static GstCaps *
352 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_transform_caps (GstAspectRatioCrop * aspect_ratio_crop,
353  GstCaps * caps)
354 {
355  GstCaps *transform;
356  gint size, i;
357 
358  transform = gst_caps_new_empty ();
359 
360  size = gst_caps_get_size (caps);
361 
362  for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
363  GstStructure *s;
364  GstStructure *trans_s;
365 
366  s = gst_caps_get_structure (caps, i);
367 
368  gst_aspect_ratio_transform_structure (aspect_ratio_crop, s, &trans_s,
369  FALSE);
370  gst_caps_append_structure (transform, trans_s);
371  }
372 
373  return transform;
374 }
375 
376 static GstCaps *
377 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_get_caps (GstPad * pad, GstCaps * filter)
378 {
379  GstPad *peer;
380  GstAspectRatioCrop *aspect_ratio_crop;
381  GstCaps *return_caps;
382 
383  aspect_ratio_crop = GST_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP (gst_pad_get_parent (pad));
384 
385  g_mutex_lock (&aspect_ratio_crop->crop_lock);
386 
387  peer = gst_pad_get_peer (aspect_ratio_crop->sink);
388  if (peer == NULL) {
389  return_caps = gst_static_pad_template_get_caps (&src_template);
390  } else {
391  GstCaps *peer_caps;
392 
393  peer_caps = gst_pad_query_caps (peer, filter);
394  return_caps =
395  gst_aspect_ratio_crop_transform_caps (aspect_ratio_crop, peer_caps);
396  gst_caps_unref (peer_caps);
397  gst_object_unref (peer);
398  }
399 
400  g_mutex_unlock (&aspect_ratio_crop->crop_lock);
401  gst_object_unref (aspect_ratio_crop);
402 
403  if (return_caps && filter) {
404  GstCaps *tmp =
405  gst_caps_intersect_full (filter, return_caps, GST_CAPS_INTERSECT_FIRST);
406  gst_caps_replace (&return_caps, tmp);
407  gst_caps_unref (tmp);
408  }
409 
410  return return_caps;
411 }
412 
413 static gboolean
414 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_src_query (GstPad * pad, GstObject * parent,
415  GstQuery * query)
416 {
417  gboolean res = FALSE;
418 
419  switch (GST_QUERY_TYPE (query)) {
420  case GST_QUERY_CAPS:
421  {
422  GstCaps *filter, *caps;
423 
424  gst_query_parse_caps (query, &filter);
425  caps = gst_aspect_ratio_crop_get_caps (pad, filter);
426  gst_query_set_caps_result (query, caps);
427  gst_caps_unref (caps);
428  res = TRUE;
429  break;
430  }
431  default:
432  res = gst_pad_query_default (pad, parent, query);
433  break;
434  }
435  return res;
436 }
437 
438 static void
439 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_property (GObject * object, guint prop_id,
440  const GValue * value, GParamSpec * pspec)
441 {
442  GstAspectRatioCrop *aspect_ratio_crop;
443  gboolean recheck = FALSE;
444 
445  aspect_ratio_crop = GST_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP (object);
446 
447  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (aspect_ratio_crop);
448  switch (prop_id) {
449  case PROP_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP:
450  if (GST_VALUE_HOLDS_FRACTION (value)) {
451  aspect_ratio_crop->ar_num = gst_value_get_fraction_numerator (value);
452  aspect_ratio_crop->ar_denom =
453  gst_value_get_fraction_denominator (value);
454  recheck = gst_pad_has_current_caps (aspect_ratio_crop->sink);
455  }
456  break;
457  default:
458  G_OBJECT_WARN_INVALID_PROPERTY_ID (object, prop_id, pspec);
459  break;
460  }
461  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (aspect_ratio_crop);
462 
463  if (recheck) {
464  GstCaps *caps = gst_pad_get_current_caps (aspect_ratio_crop->sink);
465  if (caps != NULL) {
466  gst_aspect_ratio_crop_set_caps (aspect_ratio_crop, caps);
467  gst_caps_unref (caps);
468  }
469  }
470 }
471 
472 static void
473 gst_aspect_ratio_crop_get_property (GObject * object, guint prop_id,
474  GValue * value, GParamSpec * pspec)
475 {
476  GstAspectRatioCrop *aspect_ratio_crop;
477 
478  aspect_ratio_crop = GST_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP (object);
479 
480  GST_OBJECT_LOCK (aspect_ratio_crop);
481  switch (prop_id) {
482  case PROP_ASPECT_RATIO_CROP:
483  gst_value_set_fraction (value, aspect_ratio_crop->ar_num,
484  aspect_ratio_crop->ar_denom);
485  break;
486  default:
487  G_OBJECT_WARN_INVALID_PROPERTY_ID (object, prop_id, pspec);
488  break;
489  }
490  GST_OBJECT_UNLOCK (aspect_ratio_crop);
491 }
